attributes.action: allocate more money to local councils and housing associations for disabled accomodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think that people with a disability have things hard enough with out having to fight with the local council or housing associations to be given a home thats right for them. i have 2 sons with duchenne muscular dystrophy and am in this fight at the moment.
i for one am fed up of fighting when we shouldnt have to so please sign and maybe in the future it might make things that bit easier for others in the same boat
